title: Announcement, Directions: 1988, 1988
signed: Signature imprinted in black ink, verso, center, right, running upward, sideways: Design: Edward Fella, from afar and by the sea
inscribed:
Recto: Imprinted in black across upper right corner: Novemeber 20-/ 1987/ December 19,/ gallery closed December 23 - January 7; upper center, right, around interior of box: Alice Allman/ Carl Angevine... [artists' names]... Vickie-Arndt-Whalen; across center: Directions: 1988; across lower left edge, running upward, sideways: DETROIT/ FOCUS; running downward, sideways: GALLERY/ 643 Beaubien, 3rd Floor Detroit, Michigan 48226; diagonally across lower left quadrant, running upward: Gallery Hours:/ Wednesday-Saturday/ Noon-6 p.m.;  across lower left corner: (313) 962-9025; across lower half of sheet: OPENING Reception: Friday, November 20, 6-8:30pm DIRECTIONS 1988/ Juror: Peter Williams/ Artist, Visiting Lecturer, Wayne State University; across lower right quadrant: While you are in the area you may wish to attend; across lower right edge, running upward, sideways: Holiday Toyland, November 20-December 30, Detroit Artists Market, 5-7:30pm/ 1987 GRANT RECEPTIONS, November 20-February 6, 1988/ Michigan Council for the Arts Gallery, 4-6pm
Verso: Imprinted in black, center, left, running upward, sideways: DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY/ DIRECTIONS 1988 Juror: Peter/ Williams/ Directions/ 1988/ November 20- December 19/ Opening reception: Friday, November 20, 6-8:30pm; across lower left quadrant: DETROIT FOCUS GALLERY/ 743 Beaubien,/ 3rd Floor/ Detroit,/ Michigan 48226/ With the support of/ the National Endowment for the Arts/ Detroit Council for the Arts/ Michigan Council for the Arts; across lower right quadrant: Nonprofi Org./ Bulk Rate/ U.S. Postage/ PAID/ Detroit, MI/ Permit No. 2960
description:
Poster/ announcement printed in black for Detroit Focus Gallery exhibition, designed to be mailed.  [Printed] hand-lettered text in a variety of sizes, styles.  
Recto:  Across upper left quadrant, abstract designs.  Across upper right quadrant, enclosed in box, text giving dates.  Upper center, right, box with text along four interior sides, giving participating artists.  Across center, text giving exhibition title.  Lower center, image of circle made of counter-clockwise arrows.  Lower left edge, text giving location, contact information.  Across lower half of  sheet, text giving reception and additional information.  Lower right edge, text giving additional exhibition information.  Lower right quadrant, image of pointing hand.  
Verso: Sheet filled with lines, blots, abstract shapes.  Center, circle made of counter-clockwise arrows.  Across lower half of sheet, sponsors and mailing information.

tombstone.epitaph:
Announcement, Directions: 1988, 1988. Offset lithograph on gray paper.. 
Gift of Edward Fella. 1995-42-28.
